thread.section_title: Choice Home Warranty Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Choice Home Warranty | www.choicehomewarranty.com | 3 of 111
thread.title: Andrew Hoffman
thread.title_full: Choice Home Warranty reviewed by Andrew Hoffman

author: Andrew Hoffman
title: Andrew Hoffman
text: I purchased this warranty and within 2 months I needed to file a claim on my dishwasher. They were great to assign a tech to fix the machine. After the tech left it was determined that the machine was not worth fixing. Choice gave me $$ for the purchase of new dishwasher.
